stories.title: Follina 0-day allows hackers to take full control of computer via MS Word
Understanding the Monetization of YouTube Conspiracy Theories

stories.text:
Sometimes you might want to share a screenshot of the website you're on, without revealing the personal data that is visible at that time. With Obfuscate, you can make text unreadable without changing the structure of the web page.

Hit the extension button or press Alt+Shift+O to activate for the current page.

(Note that extensions can't modify the add-on website, so trying it on there won't work.)
stories.title: Show HN: Firefox extension to obfuscate web page text

stories.text:
Whether it is your side-project, idea, open source project in any field, whether it is tech, arts or research. Anything, that is not illegal. Please submit your request below in the following format:

1. Name of the project:

2. Field/Domain:

3. Stage of the project/start-up:

4. Number of people working:

5. Whether remote collaboration is available:

6. Skill-sets required, if any:

7. Duration of the project, if applicable:

8. Main geographic location of the project:

9. Compensation, if any:

10. Anything else you want to add:
